data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Zinguldak, Turkey to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zinguldak, Turkey
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Zinguldak, Turkey the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 2661 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 226 believers living in the state of Zinguldak. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Zinguldak who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Abaza people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Jesus, teach the local leaders in Zinguldak, Turkey to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Zinguldak, Turkey.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.section_summary:
the state of Zinguldak, Turkey has a population of 601,600.

We estimate Zinguldak has 226 people who might know Jesus, 3,368 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 598,006 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2,661 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the 226 believers in Zinguldak to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.
